§ 280f–2. Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out this part $12,500,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 through 2030. (July 1, 1944, ch. 373, title III, § 399J, as added Pub. L. 119–44, title I, § 104(a), Dec. 1, 2025, 139 Stat. 673.)
